name: Cythra+
description:
A remake of the original Cythra, made to be a game to pass the time with, and an optional music option to grant the option for the player to choose their own music

The original game was made to be an easy game for me to make and learn about unity from it, this version is made to see how far I have improved

Planned Stuff
  • Customization system
  • Remove bloat
  • Power-ups?
  • Tweens for animations
  • Make WebGL version

Note: the original Cythra on game jolt is old and will not be updated, this is a remade version of the game
